# Notebooks

We provide several example notebooks :
* [Data access](https://git.sophia.mines-paristech.fr/oie/libinsitu/-/blob/main/notebooks/read-data.ipynb) : Read and plot in situ data
* [Visual QC](https://git.sophia.mines-paristech.fr/oie/libinsitu/-/blob/main/notebooks/visual-quality-check.ipynb) : Generate visual QC graphs
* [Encoding](https://git.sophia.mines-paristech.fr/oie/libinsitu/-/blob/main/notebooks/encoding-demo.ipynb) : Encode your own CSV data to NetCDF
* [Catalog](https://git.sophia.mines-paristech.fr/oie/libinsitu/-/blob/main/notebooks/catalog.ipynb) : Explore Thredds catalog programmatically
